name: morphbridge
description: Resilient mesh network implementation using zmq sockets for inter protocol communication bridging

scripts.test: cd ../../ && npm install express && npm install ws && npm install zmq && mkdir logs && node ../../tests/server.js&  node ../../http_node.js > http.txt& node ../../websocket_node.js > websocket.txt& node ../../tcp_node.js > tcp.txt& node ../../zmq_node.js > zmq.txt& node ../../sms_node.js > sms.txt&

author: PhilMc <its2uraps@gmail.com> (https://github.com/its2mc/)
